about_the_game:
Cubenomics is a physics puzzle game. Draw lines to guide the ball around a cube using gravity and puzzle mechanics. Activate all buttons to open the exit and bring the ball to the goal to solve each puzzle.

Use the various tools provided to draw out your own unique answer. Draw around the cube from any perspective and edit your lines to fit that perfect solution. Utilize puzzle obstacles and gravity to bring the ball wherever you want. There is always more than one solution each to puzzle so solve each puzzle however you want!

Guide the ball to each button to enable them, activate them all to open up the exit. Make sure you don't block your path to the exit on the way!

20 puzzles are available in this demo.

Utilize puzzle obstacles and gravity to bring the ball wherever you want. There is always more than one solution each to puzzle so solve each puzzle however you want!

Guide the ball to each button to enable them, activate them all to open up the exit. Make sure you don't block your path to the exit on the way!

name: Cubenomics Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
